title: Apple pie

properties.name: description
properties.value: Apple pies are a type of pie that can be obtained by baking an uncooked apple pie on a cooking range, requiring level 30 Cooking and granting 130 experience when successful. Players may burn the pie while baking one, resulting in a burnt pie; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 63 on ranges. Alternatively, casting the Bake Pie spell from the lunar spellbook guarantees successful baking of all pies.

SMW Subobject for Half an apple pieHigh Alchemy value: 9Examine: Mmm half an apple pie.Is members only: falseIs variant of: Apple pieUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Half an apple pie.pngWeight: 0.225Value: 15Version anchor: HalfRelease date: 17 March 2001Item ID: 2335

Apple pies are a type of pie that can be obtained by baking an uncooked apple pie on a cooking range, requiring level 30 Cooking and granting 130 experience when successful. Players may burn the pie while baking one, resulting in a burnt pie; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 63 on ranges. Alternatively, casting the Bake Pie spell from the lunar spellbook guarantees successful baking of all pies.

Apple pie heals 14 Hitpoints in total, 2 bites each healing 7. After eating it, a pie dish will remain.

Romily Weaklax, in the Cooks' Guild, may ask the player for an apple pie, paying 37 coins each. They do not have to be made by the player to get the reward.

Apple pies can be purchased from the Cooks' Guild Pie Shop for 30 coins or the Legends Guild General Store for 46 coins.

Creation[edit | edit source]

Requirements
SkillLevelXP
Cooking30 (b)130
Members
Ticks1 (0.6s) [r 1]
ToolsNoneFacilities Cooking range
Materials
ItemQuantityCost
Uncooked apple pie1401
Total Cost401
Apple pie1105
Profit−296
  1. ^ The ticks increase to 4 when using the Make-X functionality.
Steps
1. Use pastry dough on a pie dish to make a pie shell
2. Use a cooking apple on the pie shell to make an uncooked apple pie
3. Cook the uncooked apple pie on a range to finish an apple pie

23 June 2016

The half pie was reverted to its original appearance.

26 May 2016
(update)

The half pie was recoloured with the release of Botanical pies.

26 February 2015
(update)

The half eaten version was made untradeable on the Trading Post/Grand Exchange.

Players may burn the pie while baking one, resulting in a [[burnt pie]]; the [[burn rate]] while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at [[Cooking]] level 63 on ranges. Alternatively, casting the [[Bake Pie]] spell from the [[lunar spellbook]] guarantees successful baking of all pies. Apple pie heals 14 [[Hitpoints]] in total, 2 bites each healing 7. After eating it, a [[pie dish]] will remain. [[Romily Weaklax]], in the [[Cooks' Guild]], may ask the player for an apple pie, paying {{NoCoins|37}} coins each. They do not have to be made by the player to get the reward.
